actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to clarify the eligibility conditions for one type of benefit thereunder.

summary.text: States that individuals who have rendered at least 12 months of service as an employee of a railroad after December 31, 1974, or individuals who recovered from a disability and returned to work for a railroad after such date shall be eligible for retirement benefits under the Railroad Act of 1974.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to clarify the eligibility conditions for one type of benefit thereunder.
